weekly_performance.title: Campaign Launch
weekly_performance.highlights: Campaigns launched successfully. Strong early engagement with 7.2% CTR - more than double the industry average.

weekly_performance.title: Building Momentum
weekly_performance.highlights: Consistent performance through Thanksgiving week. Downey reached 12 total conversions.

weekly_performance.title: Optimization Phase
weekly_performance.highlights: Downey crossed the 15-conversion threshold needed for smart bidding upgrade.

weekly_performance.title: Smart Bidding Activated
weekly_performance.highlights: Downey transitioned to Maximize Conversions on Dec 10.

downey.name: Daisy MD - Downey - Consolidated
downey.status: Upgraded to Maximize Conversions - campaign has proven ability to generate quality leads consistently

van_nuys.name: Daisy MD - Van Nuys - Consolidated
van_nuys.status: Building conversion history - will upgrade to Maximize Conversions when 15+ conversions reached in 30-day window

downey_change.reason: Campaign gathered sufficient data (15+ conversions) for Google AI to understand what a quality lead looks like

van_nuys_status.reason: Still in learning phase, gathering data about ideal customers. Will transition to Maximize Conversions at 15+ conversions within 30-day window. This is intentional and data-backed.
